tasks.label: iOS: Build & Install & Launch (Simulator)
args: set -e; cd "${workspaceFolder}/FitDesk_iOS_MVP"; xcodebuild -project FitDesk.xcodeproj -scheme FitDesk -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Debug -quiet build; APP_PATH=$(find "$HOME/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData" -type d -name "FitDesk.app" -path "*/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/FitDesk.app" -print -quit); DEVICE_ID="${input:simulatorId}"; xcrun simctl boot "$DEVICE_ID" || true; xcrun simctl install "$DEVICE_ID" "$APP_PATH"; xcrun simctl launch "$DEVICE_ID" com.fitdesk.app || true

inputs.description: UUID симулятора (xcrun simctl list devices). Пример: 37362363-5098-41FF-A970-10315472F2B0
